inn1.comm: swing to start off the proceedings. It moves away from Salman who lets it go through to Dhoni
another one curving away, this time from the middle and off towards the off stump and Salman leans forward to defend to covers
lands outside off stump and shapes away further and Dhoni comes into play again
And again. Salman thinks about offering a shot before deciding against it.

Butt opens his account with a fluent straight drive to a full pitched delivery on the off and middle. Must be breathing lot easy now as in the last two matches he has opened with malik,  he had scored ducks
shaping away from the good length, left alone
lands his delivery full and on the off and middle line, straightens a touch, driven to mid-off. Yesterday he got the ball to curve into the right-handers and posed some trouble.
angles this one away after landing on the same middle and off line and Malik gets forward to defend
short of length, on the middle and leg, Malik goes back to tuck it towards square leg where Piyush Chawla moves quickly to his right to cut it off
moving away from Malik who shoulders arms.
sharp bouncer from RP and Malik gets into a tangle as he hops but manages to sway away just in time. Ooh and aahs from RP.
good idea as he curves this one back in off the good length but the line is around middle and leg and though it hits Malik on the pad, it would have missed leg stump.
swings it away from Butt who stretches out, bat away from the body, and pushes it to covers
fuller and driven to left of mid-off where Yusuf fumbles but recovers quickly
lands it on a length, around the off stump, shapes it away and Malik gets close to the line and taps it to the off side.

run out chance missed. Kumar got this one to come back in and Malik turcks it behind square leg, some hesitation between the batsmen - both stop midway - allows Chawla to get to the ball and fire in a throw at the striker's end but misses. Nervous start from the batsmen. It was easy run there.
in the zone outside off stump, left alone.
full and straight, trying to trap him lbw and Butt arrests the front leg movement, gets his bat around the pad and clips it to square leg
on the middle and leg, flicked straight to Chawla at square leg. Chawla is standing to the left of the umpire.
back of length, around the off stump, Malik goes back, stands tall to push it towards mid-off and since he had tapped it without much force they seize the chance to rush across for a single.
opens the bat-face and guides a length delivery to Praveen Kumar at third man
Wallop. Malik swivelled off the front foot to get on top of the bounce of a short-pitched delivery and pulled it in front of square. Good cracking shot.
on the middle and leg, once again turned to Chawla at square leg. A foot to left or right of the leggie will get Malik some runs. At least thrice he has hit straight to him.
angling away from Malik who watches the ball sail into Dhoni's gloves
around the off stump, Butt leans across to bottom-hand it to point.
on the middle stump line, worked to left of mid-on for a single
short in length, coming in towards the off stump, Malik gets behind the line and cautiously pushes it towards mid-on
fuller, just outside the off stump, holding its line and Malik steers it to point. He then practises playing the shot with the full face of the bat in the V
similar delivery, keeps a tad low and Malik crouches to jab it towards covers.
in the channel outside off stump, rushing through straight, left alone by Malik.
leans forward to push a length delivery just outside off stump to covers.
width offered outside off stump and Butt drives to covers.
a slight shuffle from leg stump and he turns a length delivery on the middle to square leg

Butt constantly talks to himself as the bowler runs in. He works a delivery from outside off stump to the on side and rushes across for a quick single before the midwicket fielder could get to the ball.
flash and a miss. Malik went hard at a short-of-length delivery well outside off stump but was beaten by the extra bounce.
beaten again. Closer to the off stump, from a good length and Malik tries to punch it on the up but the ball rushes past the outside edge
gets forward to defend to covers
lands it on a length, on the off and middle, straightens and is defended to the on side and Praveen runs through to pick the ball up. Wide slip and short cover in
back of length, outside off, Butt mistimes a cut to short cover. Malik walks across to have a chat.
on a length, moving towards the off stump, punched to short cover again.
moves in from middle and leg towards middle, Butt defends with a closed face the bat and edges it back on to his pad.
tip and run. Pushed towards mid-off for a quick single and Praveen is not happy with Yusuf's effort. He swings around, hands on the hips, has a look at Dhoni and turns back to look at Yusuf
outside off stump and left alone
on the middle stump line, turned to midwicket
cuts in from short of length, from outside off stump and worked to midwicket
fuller, outside off stump and mistimes a drive as the bottom-hand takes over completely and the bat face shuts a touch and the ball rolls to Gambhir at extra cover
closer to the off stump, coming in off the good length and Butt leans forward to defend
fuller, on the off and middle line, Butt is late in getting forward, just leans forward to defend to the on side
length delivery outside off stump and Malik runs it down to third man where RP moves smartly to pick it up. Ishant fell over at the follow through

length delivery going past the hips, Butt gets a fine tickle and Dhoni doesn't put in a dive, just tries to stop it with a lunge and doesn't reach it. It bounced well before it reached Dhoni and rolled through.
leans forward to push to covers
hits the length, moves the ball to middle, turned to the leg side
Gives the charge and hits a short of length delivery on the up to left of covers where Gambhir makes a diving stop. The umpire has a chat with Ishant about running on to the danger area.
full and down the leg side. And Butt is surprised that it's not called a wide. Quite rightly too, I had typed wide before pressing the backspace vigorously!
walks across the stumps - the middle and leg was visible and RP went for the middle - and Malik flicked it uppishly to long-leg for a single
short and wide and Butt crashes it past the point fielder. Blasted it through the off side field and hit off the front foot
lands this on a length, around middle and off, turned to the leg side for a single.
short of length, on the hips, gets on his toes to clip it to square leg
again turned to front of square leg to Chawla

again he walks across the stumps - almost all three sticks visible and RP, this time, went for the off- Malik misses a whip across the line and is struck on the pad. It would have missed off stump. RP rushes through to pick the ball and has a shy at the stumps.
on the middle and leg, turned to left of square leg umpire for a single
homing in on the off stump, defended on the back foot.
a touch slower and outside off, Malik checks his cut shot and the ball goes in the air but through the vacant gully region
banged in short, at the rib cage, Salman is cramped, tries to short-arm jab it away and it bounds off the thigh pad  to the square leg region
well wide outside off stump and this time umpire Tony Hill signals a wide

fuller, on a good length, around the off stump, holding its line and Malik pushes it back down the track. When he appeared on the scene first, IShant used to bring back most of his deliveries in, has learn t to get the odd one to straighten
short and outside off stump, Malik cracked it to left of point where Raina dives to get some hand on it which takes some pace off and allows RP to cover up at wide third man
on the pads, glanced to Yusuf at fine leg

beaten. What was he doing there? First he threatened to shuffle and then got struck, both foot glued to each other almost, and has a lame poke at a delivery angling away from him. Perhaps, he saw the banner and got shy
mistimes a flick towards wide mid-on
yorker just outside off stump, Butt crouches to dig it out to point region for a single
angling away from Malik who opens the bat face to guide it down to Yusuf at third man
slightly slower in pace, full outside off stump, dabbed to third man for a single
leans forward to push a length delivery to point
fires in a length delivery that skids on towards the middle stump and defended to covers. Again, the umpire talks to Ishant about running on to the danger area.
on the middle stump and again pushed to the off side.

tight line on the middle stump continues, Butt tries to manufacture a single by opening the bat face and guide it but it's too straight and all he gets is a edge behind the stumps. Malik is half-way down the track, Dhoni whips his gloves off and fires in a throw at the non-striker's end and Malik, cleverly, changes angle and gets between the throw and the stumps
on the leg and middle and this time he works it past square leg
probing line around off stump and Malik pays respect by dead-batting it to the off side

back of length, around the off stump, pushed to right of mid-on where Yuvraj Singh makes a tumbling stop. There was no need actually for him to dive, the ball was going slow but that's how he usually fields.

gorgeous straight drive from Malik and I wonder whether that girl who put up the banner feels like she is in Jannat (heaven). He walked down the track and moved into the line of a full pitched delivery outside off and caressed it straight past the bowler.
Malik shuffles across to the off stump and punches a length delivery to mid-on
and this time stays at his normal position and defends to short mid-off
119.9 kmph length delivery outside off stump, Malik tried to late cut it, missed and Dhoni whipped the bails off.
And connects this time. Delicate late cut. He allowed the ball to come to him before gliding it off the face of the bat to third man boundary
leans forward to push towards mid-off and he runs with the stroke and reaches in time to beat the throw from Rohit
short and outside off, Malik cuts but straight to backward point
just outside off stump, dabbed to third man
50 up for Pakistan as Butt guides a slower delivery to point region for a single
Malik has taken the responsibility of upping the run rate. He thrust his front leg forward and knifed a length delivery on the up through cover point.

Four more. Malik is on a roll here. Short and climbing outside off stump, Malik got on his toes and carved it up and over point. Super strike from the captain. Drinks break and Pakistan are up and running now. All ten wickets in hand.
short and wide outside off, cut to right of Sehwag at sweeper cover
walks across the stumps, exposing all three, and Praveen bangs it short and fires it outside off, Malik jumps to defend it to the off side
from back of length, just outside off stump, Malik chops it to right of the third-man fielder
Walloped to the cover boundary. It was short and outside off stump, Malik creamed it on the up through covers. Moves to 36 now.
rotates the strike by running down a length delivery to third man
leans forward to defend a full delivery to the off side
leans forward to push a full length delivery to mid-off
cuts in towards the off stump, Malik guides it to backward point
beaten by a very good delivery that left Malik late. He keeps cutting 'em in but suddenly would slip in a ball like this
leans forward to push a length delivery back to the bowler
slashed through the vacant slip region. Not all that room given outside off stump but Malik decides to go for the shot, threw the kitchen sink at it and it flashed through the slips
turns this one to backward point
back of length, outside off stump, punched to deep cover
cuts away from the off stump, full in length, pushed to mid-off
on the middle and leg, wristed to fine leg
slower one from round the stumps, turned to square leg. Malik goes across to say something about Salman.

shout for lbw but turned down. It pitched short of length and Butt shaped to pull but it kept a touch low and he was hit on the bent thigh in front of middle and off. Hawk eye says it would have hit the top of the off stump. The umpire obviously reckoned it would have gone over.
worked to the on side
full and moving in towards middle and off, Malik leans forward to defend
leans forward to defend a length delivery to point.
change of pace and Malik waits for the ball to arrive before running it down to third man
on the off and middle, pushed to covers
takes the risk and it pays off. He moved outside leg stump, Ishant hurled it on a length around off stump line and Butt lashed it through backward point
retains the strike with a dab to third man
flighted full on the off stump line, driven to long-on
stretches forward to push a delivery outside off to covers
stepped down the track, took it on the full and lofted it over to wide long-on
stays back to cut a short of length delivery but straight to backward point
again comes down the track, but Piyush gets this one to dip rapidly on Malik who lunges to dig it out to midwicket

Dhoni took the risk of introducing Chawla in the last over of the powerplays and Malik took up the challenge. He swings this delivery on the middle and leg to deep midwicket boundary. 50 up for the captain
floated outside off stump, pushed to covers
slower through the air, short of length, cut to deep cover
Malik tried to late cut a delivery outside off stump and it missed his gloves and Dhoni got his right leg in the way to make the stop. Too harsh to call it as a dropped chance
leans forward to drive to long-on
comes in from round the stumps, stabbed down the track
again in from that angle and Butt pushes it out to the on side

shout for lbw as the fielders think, rightly, it hit the pad first before Malik got the bat on it. It landed on the off and middle line, flipped on straight and Malik was cramped for room and tried to bring his bat down in a hurry but it hit the pad first. Difficult for the umpire to pick those up
leans forward to on drive to deep midwicket
A long hop gets a wicket.  Butt could have hit it anywhere, he went for the pull shot but hit it straight to Raina at midwicket.
just outside off stump, pushed to the off side
googly outside off stump and Younis stretched across to defend it to the cover region
goes back to work a delivery turning into him past square leg
flat and quick, pushed back to the bowler
slower and full, turned to midwicket
leans forward to work a full delivery to the on side
quicker, on the middle and off, Younis tries to tap it towards square leg but can't get any pace on the ball and it just rolls over to the on side
leans forward to drive to long-on
another shout for lbw as the ball pitched on the leg stump before turning in to hit the pad in front of leg and middle. Turned down by the umpire who probably thought it pitched outside leg
sweeps for a single. He will deploy that shot a lot
nicely clipped to fine leg boundary. He stretched forward to wrist a full delivery on the leg and middle line to right of short fine leg.
allows the ball to turn before defending
Sweep no 2 for Younis. Another single. He plays that shot very well.
floated outside off stump, stretches well across to drive to sweeper cover. 100 up
on the middle and leg, tucked to square leg
on the middle stump line, clipped past square leg
slower and bit of air, outside off stump, driven to covers
Malik waltzes down the track, reaches the pitch of a delivery on the middle stump line and cleared long-on. Lovely swing of the bat.
leans forward to thread the midwicket gap and they run hard to come back for the second run. The crowd roar their approval
Ah! the reverse sweep now. Four to the third man boundary. Looks very good when it comes off. Thrilling stuff.
loopy flighted one on the middle and off, pushed to the off side
And this time the conventional sweep shot as Younis takes it on the full
full, too full outside off stump and Malik drives inside-out to the extra-cover boundary. Malik is turning it on here. Super stuff from the captain
shifts his line to middle and leg, turned to right of midwicket
slider on the off and middle, Malik pushes hard at it and gets an inside edge to square leg
driven back to the bowler
leans forward to on drive but gets a leading edge, along the ground, back to the bowler
stays back to work a delivery spinning in to middle stump to deep midwicket
long hop and Malik pulls it along the ground and to Praveen Kumar at long leg
goes for the reverse sweep but doesn't connect properly. It came in from short of length and he didn't quite put it away and the ball just rolls back down the track
leans forward to turn a full delivery behind square leg for a single
another sweep from Younis and a single down to Rohit at deep square leg
gets forward, Piyush drags back the length and Malik lunges forward to defend
shifts his line to well outside off, Malik reaches out to cut it past backward point.
googly and Malik almost punches it back to the bowler. It just falls short of the lunging Piyush
lands it just short of a driveable length and is pushed to covers
slides on to middle and leg line, clipped behind square leg for a single
down the track but Yousuf hurls it shortish and flatter, pushed to midwicket
on the middle and leg, from a length ,turned to the on side for a single
floated full outside off stump, driven crisply to deep cover
waits for the ball to spin to him before wristing it to deep backward square leg
backs outside leg stump and late cuts a delivery homing in on the off stump to third man. RP gives the chase and just about manages to push it back inside the ropes
on the pads, turned behind square leg
starts off with a wide delivery down leg side and Malik says thank you and laps it around the corner to fine leg
short of length, coming in to the middle stump, punched to wide long-on and they run well to come back for three runs. Wonderful phase of cricket for Pakistan
leans forward to turn a delivery on the middle to the leg side
stretches forward to push a delivery on the middle and off back to Yuvraj
slows up the pace, full and outside off, driven to covers
on the off stump line, tapped towards backward point for a quick single
another reverse sweep, another boundary. Yusuf saw him switching and fired in a full one on the middle but Younis played it really well.
stretches across to work a delivery outside off to midwicket
slows up the pace and Younis is a touch early into his shot and turns it to midwicket
gets forward and on drives to long on for a single
Malik does the opposite: stays back to punch to long-on
full and just outside off stump, defended to the off side
again stays back to work a delivery coming in from round the stumps to deep midwicket
turns it to right of midwicket for a quick single
full and outside off stump, quick and Malik went down on his knee to crack it to backward point
gets a single down to long-on
flighted full outside off stump, driven hard to Gambhir at sweeper cover
gets forward to drive towards mid-off but Raina gets across from extra cover to make a diving stop. Drinks break.
Yusuf delivers a friendly full toss, Younis steps out and lofts the ball into the deep at midwicket for a one-bounce four
Younis dabs the ball towards midwicket for a quick single, Raina throws the ball back to Dhoni but Malik has run extremely quickly and is well home by the time Dhoni breaks the stumps
flat and fast from Yusuf, Malik flicks off his pads for a single behind square
Younis backs away to a slightly short ball and cuts towards deep point
driven off the back foot towards mid-on, Raina cuts it off from short midwicket, well done!
played behind square for another single, this is Malik's highest ODI score as captain by the way
goes back to turn a delivery to square leg
just outside off stump, pushed to right of Yusuf at short third man
lands on leg stump, from over the wickets, turns to middle and leg, worked to square leg for another single
from over the stumps for Younis who slog sweeps a full delivery from outside off to Ishant at deep midwicket . He employed the slog sweep a lot in the Kitply final
leans forward to drive to long-off
backs way to cut a length delivery outside off to left of sweeper cover for couple of runs. It was not all that short but he played the shot well
from round the stumps, turns in from outside leg, pushed back to the bowler
comes down the track but the length was shortened and he pushes it to the off side. This is going to be interesting. Piyush from round the stumps
Malik moves to 98 with a well-connected sweep shot to a delivery landing outside leg stump
on the off and middle line, guided to cover point. 0n 99
Younis has his own strategy to the round-the-stumps attack. He plays the reverse sweep. Over point
lets the ball turn into middle and pushes it to off side

Cut to third man. And that's his first hundred as captain. Super innings this. It has been great to watch him work with Younis Khan, who is such a super player of spin. Younis is there to congratulate and pats him on the helmet.
leans forward to play a square drive on the up but straight to point. Nice looking stroke that. A whiplash square drive.
fuller and driven to covers. Again, the full swing of the bat.
length delivery that holds its line outside off stump and Younis lashes it to third man.
back of length, straightening outside off and Malik chops it to third man
full pitched, mistimes a drive to mid-off and will pick up a single
still from round the stumps, lands it outside leg and bottom-edges a sweep for a single
lovely skilful shot. He went down the track, got outside the line of a delivery that pitched outside leg and lofted it over the bowler's head
again he goes down the track, again outside the line of the delivery that landed well outside leg but since he had reached the pitch of the ball, he swung it to over midwicket
Malik has gone berserk. Another sashay down the track, another swing and will pick up a couple to right of long-on
goes back to wrist a delivery on the leg stump to square leg
Younis sticks to his favourite sweep shot for a single
short in length, just outside off stump, Younis taps it close on the off side, towards backward point and another good single taken. The running between the wickets has fab today

just outside the off stump, holding its line again and Malik plays another of his chops down to third man. He goes back and across, gets the bat in a horizontal position and comes down on the ball in an angle
slower one, Younis is late in picking it up but checks his drive and pushes it towards mid-on for a single
another slower one, Malik doesn't pick it up and checks his shot and Ishant moves to his left to pick the ball
Blasted to wide long-off. He drilled that one. He stayed still on the leg stump line and went through the line of a full pitched delivery outside off stump.
full and straighter, driven to long-on for a single. Pakistan are on 202 for 1.
dropped by Piyush running back from mid-off. He shakes his head ruefully, Malik got a leading edge to an intended lofted shot to the leg side and Piyush failed to get under the ball swirling down
turned to short fine leg, Malik is half-way down the track, Younis is not going anywhere and the ball is not picked cleanly
short delivery and pulled to deep midwicket region and that's his fifty. Entertaining innings.
reverse sweeps for a single
moves outside leg stump, stays still to punch a short-of-length ball on the middle to extra cover boundary. Improvising beautifully.
dropped by Gambhir at deep midwicket. The virus is spreading among the Indians. The crowd roar  a sigh of relief. A slog sweep that went awry and Gambhir rushed forward, lunged but couldn't hold on.
shuffles towards the off stump, chips a full delivery on the off to wide mid-on and as it happens normally, he took couple of steps before realising he has a runner
length delivery outside off, dabbed to backward point
slapped to wide long-on. It was a short-of-length delivery and Younis pulled it from outside off to the on side
another short of length delivery, outside the off stump and punched on the up to deep cover
moves outside leg stump, mistimes a cut shot to point region
length delivery well outside off stump, Malik tried to thrash it over the bowler's head but edges it to third man
on the middle and leg, turned past square leg for a single
on driven to long-on for a single
comes down the track, Yusuf shortens the length and flattens the trajectory and Younis edges the intended heave past square leg
on the middle stump, worked to midwicket.
plays the sweep shot to rotate the strike

No one drops this time and Younis falls after an impressive entertaining knock. He went down on his knee to play the slog sweep - the shot that got him so many runs in the kitply final- but edges it high towards mid-off but Raina ran across from the straightish midwicket position to take a good catch.
short of length, turning away, cut to deep cover
goes back to cut to point
drifts in to the off and middle, Yousuf edges it to the on side
short of length, coming in from outside off, cut to deep point
on the middle, worked to midwicket
goes outside leg stump before moving outside off and whips to square leg
full pitched outside off, driven to sweeper cover
short of length, a tad slower, cut to deep point
gets a single to midwicket region
outside off stump, he moved across the stumps and tried to play it across the line but didn't conenct
from round the stumps RP serves a short of length delivery down leg and Yousuf laps it around the corner
homing in on the off stump, cut to third man
Yousuf welcomes Praveen Kumar with a neatly placed slash over backward point.
And now plays a cheeky shot. He moved across to the off side, planting his front leg outside off and lapped a slower one off a length past the the diving short fine-leg fielder.
better length this time - after two length deliveries he hurls one on the yorker length outside off, dug out to covers
hits the good length again and Misbah flashes it to wide third man

almost run out. Fullish, on the off stump, square driven to deep point where Gambhir moves to his left and fires in an accurate throw to Dhoni who breaks the stumps. Not out is the verdict from upstairs
full, just short of the blockhole, on the middle, driven to right of covers but Raina makes a diving stop
really full but well outside the off stump, going over the wide line mark and the umpire extends his arms.
leans forward to square drive a full deliver to wide third man where Praveen Kumar makes mess of it.
full pitched, driven to deep cover. Yousuf has moved to 26 from 17 balls
leans forward to drive a full length delivery to wide long-off for couple of runs.
another off drive but Raina cuts it at extra cover and fires in a throw at the non-striker's end, misses and Rohit Sharma backs up well with a dive
slower one, Yousuf waited and went for the cut shot but the extra bounce meant he missed it
This is a gem of a knock from the classy Yousuf. Lovely inside-out drive well over Raina at extra cover.
shaping past the off stump, Misbah tries to late cut it but fails to connect
shuffles outside the off stump, Praveen fires it full on the middle, whipped to deep square leg

Yousuf's cameo ends. Run out. Yousuf paddles a full delivery outside off  to RP at short fine leg, the throw comes in to Praveen who takes it well in front of the stumps, turns around and lunges to break the stumps.
stands tall to punch a length delivery to deep cover. And crowd roar for that single. Reason? Afridi on strike now.
walks to the off stump, turns a length delivery to wide midwicket region and both run hard to come back for the second run.
he moves outside leg, then moves to the off and a confused Praveen bowls a slower one down leg
full pitched outside off stump and Afridi drives to left of long-off for two runs
from round the stumps, coming in towards the off stump, chopped to third man
fullish, outside off stump, Afridi tried to swing it across the line but edged it towards long-off
homing in on the off stump, Misbah can't get the room he wants and dabs it to the point region.
moves outside the off stump and has a wild swing across the line, misses but will run a bye as the ball bounced awkwardly in front of Dhoni and bounced off his gloves on to his jaw.
And where does RP bowl. Full and down the leg side. Afridi went for a paddle but couldn't connect

moves outside leg stump, RP follows him with a full delivery, driven to long-on. Afridi is not happy with his bat and asks for a new piece of wood. I almost typed in weed there! We don't want to get into that, now do we?!
retains the strike with a drive to deep cover
Skillful shot down to third man. It kicked up from short of length outside off stump, Misbah got on top of the bounce well and lashed it through the slips region. Nice use of wrists.
moved just outside off stump and Ishant hurled it well outside the off stump
again a slight shuffle, a swing of the bat and Gambhir picks the ball up at sweeper cover
yorker length delivery outside off stump and square driven through the off side and Gambhir rushes across to his left to make another stop
almost yorker length, on the off and middle, stabbed towards mid-on and easy single by the time the long-on fielder converges on the ball
dropped by Raina at long-on. Tough chance. Misbah swung a full delivery from outside off towards wide long-on and Raina charged ahead and lunged but ended up palming it
slower one and Misbah picks it up at the last instant and checks his drive
lovely inside-out off drive. Classy stroke. He moved outside the leg stump and drove a full length delivery on the off stump through extra cover
makes room again, RP slows up the pace, shortens the length and Misbah can't connect with his cut shot
moves to the off stump line now and swings a full delivery to long-on
backs away outside leg, RP fires it outside off, Afridi thinks it might be called a wide and lets it go. Misbah walks across to have a chat with Afridi.
lands it full, on the middle stump line and Afridi tried to swing it to long-on but got a thick outside edge and Dhoni pouches it

swing and a miss. RP goes over the wickets for the left-hander and fires it on a length and Tanvir fails to connect with his slog across the line and the ball bounces over the middle stump. Both RP and Tanvir smile.
Stunning straight drive. He planted his back leg in front of the off stump line and drills a full pitched delivery to right of long-off
slower one outside off and Misbah wanted to send it over the on side field but  didn't connect
bangs it short of length, just outside off and Misbah flat-bats a pull to long-on and he wanted the second but Tanvir doesn't want to come and Misbah is not happy.
dropped by Ishant at midwicket. Tanvir dragged a slower one from outside off towards midwicket, Ishant jumped but couldn't hold on to a fairly simple catch.

fuller, outside off stump, driven to long-off. Misbah ran the first run hard, tried to turn for the second but saw that the fielder had released the throw , stayed at the crease. Last ball coming up. Can he finish it off with a boundary?
yorker length delivery just outside off stump, Misbah has a swing, edges it to short fine-leg region

inn2.comm: Gambhir watches a bouncer sail high over him.
another short-pitched delivery outside off stump and Gambhir upper cuts it one bounce to the deep backward point boundary
shout for lbw as Gambhir was struck high on the pad by a delivery that straightened on the middle stump line. Gambhir practises playing it straight back
cuts it away from Gambhir who shoulders arms. We have had a bouncer, a short pitched one, a delivery that curved in and the one that has moved away
cuts in off a length, on the middle and leg line, Gambhir crouches it to tap it behind square leg

beaten outside off stump, Sarfraz went up in appeal and Gul followed him late. It was a length delivery outside off, Sehwag tried to punch it on the up but the ball moved away and past the outside edge
full in length, just outside off stump, Sehwag flashes it to covers
swings  away from Gambhir who square drives to point
lovely cover drive. He leaned well into the shot, head over the ball and caressed a delivery angling in to him through extra cover.
cuts in from short of  length, Gambhir walks down the track, tries to work it to the on side and is struck high on the pad in front of the off stump
beaten by a delivery that straightened outside off stump, Gambhir searched for it and his bat went inside the line
cuts in from short of length, Gambhir defends to the off side.
swings down the leg side. Wide. Gambhir smiles as he walks over to have a chat with Sehwag
fullish, swinging in to the legs and Gambhir flicks to square leg where Salman fields.
on the leg stump line, off a short run-up and it goes off the pad. He is struggling out there. Didn't complete the follow through properly. Hope he doesn't pick up a serious injury here.
on a length, around the middle and off, tapped to the off side, they think about a single but decide against it

Wow! What a stunner from Misbah at backward point. Supremely athletic effort from the acting captain. Gambhir had flashed a short-of-length delivery to left of Misbah who flew, his left-arm outstretched and plucked it like a mythical creature. A Youtube moment.

short and kicking outside off stump, almost head-high and Raina arches back to fend it through backward point. Wahab, the sub, sends in a wild throw and overthrows result.  he did well to make a fine sliding stop near the ropes but the throw wasn't accurate
short outside off stump, Sehwag reaches out to cut to backward point
on a length, on the middle, pushed to mid-on
big shout for lbw as Raina falls over a touch, trying to flick it to the on side. It was going down the leg side.
short of length, skids on to the off stump and Raina goes right back to push it back to the bowler
wide outside off stump and Raina went down on his knee to crash it through extra cover.
swings in towards middle and off stump line, good delivery, and Raina pushes it to the on side
full one that swings in a touch, driven to the off side. Tanvir follows up close to the batsman and glares at Raina. No words exchanged.
leans forward to drive to covers
nice teasing curving delivery outside off stump, Sehwag lets it swing past him.
closer to the off stump and Sehwag pushes it to extra cover for a single
on the middle and leg, pushed towards mid-on. Raina adjusts his helmet, walks towards square leg, turns and now is ready to face the next one
length delivery moving away from Raina who defends to the off side. "That's the line," says Sarfraz. It is.
fullish, on the similar line outside off stump, Raina doesn't move his feet, tries to cover drive it and gets a thick inside edge behind square leg but he runs hard to come back for the second run
super extra-cover drive. He creamed that. Full and outside off and he went through the line.
on the leg and middle line, tapped to square leg. Sarfraz walks right up to the stumps and shouts out words of encouragement to his team-mates.
on the off stump line, straightening and punched to covers
short of length, slanting away from Sehwag who went back and across, shifted his balance to the back foot and cut it to wide third man
drifting on to the pads and Raina tickles it fine.
full and outside off stump, sweetly timed to cover point
Gorgeous extra-cover drive. Raina leaned into his shot and presented the full face of the blade. Firm push and it races away.
cutting into the off and middle line, Sehwag, who has been cautious today, pushes it back down the track
back of length, coming in towards middle and leg, punched in the air past square leg for couple of runs. Afridi shines the ball vigorously before handing it to the bowler
bad delivery down the leg side and Sehwag helps himself to a boundary with a glance to fine leg
full and on the leg and middle line, Sehwag whips it in the air but well to the right of the square-leg fielder

shifts his line to the off stump and Sehwag went hard at his drive and edged it in the air towards mid-on. He immediately asks for a new bat. That ball made contact with the bottom of the bat. He has to wait for the end of the over
cutting in to middle and leg, from a length, clipped to long leg. Now he can change his bat.
slanting away from Sehwag who tries to square drive it and edges it, along the ground, to the slip fielder
down the leg side, bounds away off the pads and Sarfraz makes a fine diving stop to his left.
Short and well outside off stump, Sehwag upper cuts it to deep backward point, one bounce over the ropes. The bottom-hand came of the handle as he completed that shot
gets this one towards middle stump, defended to the off side
leans forward to defend a length delivery on the off and middle
Sehwag special. Four to backward point. Short and wide, he freed his arms and up she soared to the boundary.
on a length, on the middle stump line, pushed to covers
edged but there is no slip there. Raina followed a delivery leaving him. Partly edged, partly steered.
outside off stump, steered to backward point
clips a length delivery in the air and just past the midwicket fielder.
leans forward to push a full delivery to mid-off and Afridi fires in a throw at the non-striker's end and Raina dives into his crease to make sure he gets there in time.
gets behind the line of a length delivery on the off stump and defends to the off side
leans forward to defend a full length delivery on the off stump. More from Sarfraz:"C'mon yaar, ek hi jagah pey rakho (keep bowling in one area)
Sarfraz would be disappointed with this delivery. Down the leg side and Raina got  his bat to it. Enough for a boundary
on the middle and leg line, turned to long leg
full and on the middle stump line, slogged across the line through midwicket, didn't time it well and Yousuf gives chase

full and outside off, another big swing from Sehwag, he went too hard at the shot and mistimes it to Yousuf at mid-on. Ah! Yousuf fumbled and it went right between his legs and hit him you know here. Ouch! Yousuf manages a smile. Brave fellow.
appeal for lbw but it was going down leg side
just outside off stump, pushed to Yousuf at mid-on for a single
slides on to the middle and leg, clipped to long leg
on the leg stump line, runs off the pad to short fine leg
googly on the leg stump line, tapped to midwicket
skidding to the middle and leg, worked to square leg
long hop and Raina went back, opened his stance and dismissed it to the deep midwicket boundary

Almost run out. Back of length, outside off stump, guided to backward point and they rush across for a quick single. Fawad moved to his left and he is a left-hander and fired in a throw but misses the stumps. had he hit, Raina would have been gone
fullish, on the middle stump line, on driven to mid-on
full in length outside off stump, Raina plays well away from his body and steers it to wide third man
on the off stump line, straightens and Sehwag opens the blade, guides to Fawad at backward point
similar line, again worked to Fawad at backward point
fuller, curving away and Sehwag gets forward to nudged it to Fawad Alam
full delivery on the middle and leg line, swept hard to long leg. One bounce to the fielder
a front foot no ball. It skid on to the middle stump line and jabbed out by Sehwag. Free hit coming up
Monster hit. Afridi bowled a slow loopy delivery and Sehwag, who was down the track, smashed it over long-on
goes back to push to wide midwicket
on the off stump line, pushed back to Afridi
slows up the pace, loopy delivery on the leg stump line, Raina is made to wait and he pushes it to midwicket
Wallop. He cleared the front leg and swung a flighted delivery right over the bowler's head.
Fab shot. He waltzed down the track and punched a length delivery inside-out over long-off.
bangs in a bouncer, ducked under
another bouncer, on the middle and leg line, Raina gets inside the line and ducks. Rao has a few words to say to Raina and the crowd love the battle
on the middle and leg, turned behind square leg
back of length, straightening outside off stump, Sehwag is a touch squared up but adjusts to push it to the on side
digs it short, chest-high delivery around the off stump, Sehwag hops to get on top of the bounce and places it behind square leg for a single
lovely late cut to welcome Tanvir. The ball was coming in off back of length, he opened the bat--face and, like Malik had done a few times in his knock, ran it through the vacant slip region
clipped past square leg for couple of runs
from wide of the crease, just outside off stump, dabbed to third man
gets behind the line of a length delivery on the off stump and defends solidly
Tanvir hurls a bouncer across and Raina ducks to evade. One for the over, says the umpire.
on the middle stump line, from short of length, worked to short fine-leg region for a single
short and kicking up on the off stump line, Raina gets on top of the bounce to tap it down close on the off side and they cross over for the single that brings up his fifty
on a length, on the middle and off stump line, turned to the leg side
Short and down the leg side, Sehwag couldn't connect with his pull shot
fullish, curving in, Sehwag tries to whip it away through the on side and inside edges to the pad
rotates the strike with a cut to third man
on the leg stump line, misses a glance and it runs away off the pad to short fine leg region. 100 of the partnership up
digs it short outside off stump and Sehwag gets his bat away from the line of the ball
short and wide, cut hard to the deep point boundary, the sweeper cover couldn't get across in time.
fuller, closer to the off stump, guided to backward point
a tad slower, similar line and length, steered to backward point again
Banged in short and Raina, who has left many a bouncer alone, decided to go for the pull and executed it really well. Over midwicket for a boundary.
lands on a length, around off and middle, skids on and Raina crouches to keep it out to the off side
shuffles across, Sohail slows up the pace and Raina edges a glance on to his pad
short of length on the off stump line, turned to midwicket. It was in the air briefly but landed well short of the fielder
poor delivery - short and well outside the off stump and Sehwag crashes it to deep backward point boundary. 50 up for Sehwag.
coming in to the middle and leg, turned to long leg
on the hips, tucked behind square leg for a single
short delivery just outside off stump, cut to third man
pushed to the on side
moves outside leg stump at the last instant and drives inside-out over mid-off.
slider on the middle stump, again bit of room and he cuts hard but Manjoor Ahmed dives to  make a half-stop at point
full and on the leg and middle, sweeps it for a single
slider skids on to the middle stump, Sehwag stays back, tries to create room but is cramped as the ball comes back in and he chops it down at the last minute
shimmies down the track and swings a flighted delivery cleanly over wide long-on.
fires it in quick and flat on the midddle, dabbed to the on side.
Raina follows Sehwag. Down the track, the bat comes down and the ball lands outside midwicket boundary
long hop, mistimes a pull to deep midwicket.
pushed to covers
leans forward to turn a full delivery to midwicket
Raina is really timing the ball superbly tonight. He went back to force a short of length delivery through extra cover and it kept racing away
down the leg side, off the pads to short fine leg
on the off stump line, Raina goes back to punch a length delivery to long-off
lands outside leg stump, spins in a touch but it's still outside leg and wide called. Sehwag let it go through. AFridi is not happy with the call and Sehwag has a big smile
goes back to turn it to square leg
again down leg, another wide
not all that short but Raina goes really back to pull to deep midwicket
leans forward to flick a flighted delivery through midwicket
leans forward to defend a flighted delivery on the off stump
Sehwag pulls off a Younis Khan special. Reverse sweeps a flighted delivery to the deep point boundary
tries to reverse paddle now! But will get a leg bye
leans over to tickle it behind square leg
well outside leg. Wide.
Ah! another reverse sweep to a delivery from outside leg stump past backward point
stays back to force a full delivery to long-on.
No cute reverse sweeps or paddle for Raina who charges down the track, gets down on his knee and disposes a loopy delivery over midwicket boundary and into the stands.
leans forward to defend
slows up the pace, loops it outside off and Sehwag misses a slog sweep
another slow loopy delivery, pretty full, Sehwag tries to whip it, edges it to his pad
leans across to flick a full slow delivery from outside off past square leg
quicker one on the middle, turned to square leg
pushes a single to long-on and will be on strike next over
leans forward to push a delivery back to the bowler
comes down the track, Butt shortens the length and its pushed to midwicket. Pakistan have run out of bowling options due to injuries
And he smashes this one over deep midwicket. on to 84.
You can sense that he is getting increasingly edgy, wants to hit every ball now. He thrust his front foot out and swung a full delivery on the off stump over midwicket.
another single off the last ball, down to long-on. Again he will be on strike.
rotates the strike with a dab to square leg
picks up a leg bye
stays back to punch it to on side but edges it on to his pad.
taps a slow loopy delivery to midwicket region
googly that bounces a bit more than Raina expects, pushed to midwicket
around off stump, steered to short third man
Moves to 97 with a delicate late cut. It was just outside off and he steered it through the vacant slip region.
dug in short and Sehwag hops to defend to the on side
leans forward to drive to deep cover.
short delivery, at the rib cage, Raina takes the bottom-hand off the handle and tucks the ball behind square leg
length delivery that straightens outside off stump and Sehwag is squared up and edges it to third man
jumps to get on top of a short delivery and defends to the on side. Sehwag on strike now. On 99.
That's his hundred no 9. Hit down to long-on. He jogs across, takes the helmet off, is enveloped by a hug from Raina. Great entertainment.
leans forward to defend to the off side, looks for a single , keeper under-arms an throw and they will cross over now for the over throw
super shot. He moved down the track and smashed a flighted delivery to left of long-off. Not a man move.
goes back to dab it through midwicket
goes right back to a full delivery and works it through midwicket
Raina misses out on the hundred. He punches a back-of-length delivery straight to Fawad Alam at extra cover. But it has been an wonderful innings. Great timing.
short and at the ribcage, turned to fine leg
full pitched outside off stump, hit uppishly to mid-off
bouncer but too high to trouble Sehwag
leans forward to defend a length delivery cutting into the middle stump
stays adjacent to the line of a length delivery on the off stump and fists it to right of sweeper cover for couple of runs
top edges a pull shot to fine-leg region for couple more.
goes back to pull a slightly short delivery to deep midwicket
goes back, tries to chop a delivery outside off to the off side but edges it to square leg
turned to square leg
lands outside leg stump, whipped to deep midwicket
skids off a length outside off, Yuvraj is beaten on the cut
gets forward to defend
tossed up outside leg stump, Sehwag plants his front leg outside the line and whips it to wide long-on
makes room to cut a delivery on the stumps but Misbah makes a diving stop at covers
goes back to pull a short delivery to wide long boundary. He is playing with the attack now. 74 more to win.
from round the stumps now, full and outside off stump, driven powerfully to left of long-off
Yuvraj goes for his sweep shot, misses and it bounds away of the pad
leans forward to flick, misses but will pick a leg bye. Drinks break
on the pads, turned past square leg
leans forward, opens the bat face to steer a ball on middle and off to backward point
drives elegantly to sweeper cover

holes out to long-off. He came down the track and ended up slicing it high and Younis got under it, lunged forward to take the catch. But what a smashing knock this has been. Started off carefully, got his eye in before exploding merrily
full, on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket
will retain the strike with a drive to long-on
skips down the track to ease it to long-on for another single
full, on the off stump, hit hard to long-off
loopy delivery on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket
gets forward to defend to covers
Don't bowl short. Yuvraj deposits it over midwicket.
leans forward to push a full delivery to the off side
stretches forward to play a compact defensive stroke. Just like the last ball.
wrists it past square leg, they run the first run hard but the fielder is quick on to the ball and they settle for a single
leans forward to smother the delivery
turns a slower deliveyr to the off side
quicker, flatter, shorter, cut past point
leans forward, almost yorks himself but digs it out to the off side
picks up a single with a drive to long-on
floated outside off, carved to right of sweeper cover
pushes this one down to long-off
driven to deep cover for yet another single. Indians jogging along very comfortably here
another drive, another single, down to long-off now
lands outside leg stump, turns away, left alone
steered to backward point
sends this one to deep midwicket
flighted on the off stump, driven fluently to long-off
lunges forward to push it to backward point
leans across to squeeze a tossed up delivery to left of backward point and Fawad has a needless shy at the non-striker's end and gives away one more run
low full toss, dipping, driven to long-off. Might as well bring the field in and tempt them to go over
a touch short, cut to right of point where Afridi fields
pushes a delivery on the middle and off to covers
fuller and driven down to long-off
leans forward to drive to long-off
The end is nigh. Goes down on his knee, takes the flighted one on the full and swings it over midwicket boundary
turns it behind square leg
short delivery, turning away, flat-bats it back to the bowler
hands the strike back to Yuvraj with a drive to long-off
stays back to punch a short-of-length delivery to long-on
leans forward to square drive a full delivery towards backward point
fires in a low full toss, eased to long-off
just outside off stump, short in length, dabbed to short third man
floats it full, driven elegantly down to long-on
on the middle stump line, driven down the track and the bowler  dives to his right, gets a hand on the ball and it hits the sticks but Yuvraj is in

Biggie! It lands on the roof! Yuvraj cleared his front leg and biffed it cleanly over midwicket. Up, up and over. It crashed on to the roof and rolled down back into the stands. Indians are having a party out there. No Pakistani has managed to gate crash it tonight.
leans forward to drive to extra cover
Rameez Raja says, "With every six, the attendance is thinning!" Dhoni is down the track to whip a full delivery to long-on
short and quick, punched back to the bowler
slower and again driven back to Younis
drags it short and Yuvraj rocked back, opened his stance and pulled it very hard to wide midwicket boundary
flatter, quicker, dabbed to the off side
on the middle and leg, a nudge to the leg side will allow him to retain the strike
on the off stump line, tapped to cover point for a single
on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket
short delivery outside off stump, cut to deep point
just outside the off stump, punched to covers
fullish, outside off stump, square driven to backward point
just outside off stump, driven through point this time
dipping delivery on the middle stump line, pushed to long-on for a single.
goes on the back foot to punch it to where else but long-on. Just 12 runs more.
well outside off stump, driven to sweeper cover
on the leg and middle, eased to long-on
lands outside off and turns away further, Dhoni reaches out and cuts to deep cover region
short in length and quick, dabbed to left of midwicket for a easy single. Just 8 more now.
slower one, full, Yuvraj checks his shot and just pushes it with soft hands towards mid-off for a single
on the legs, a dab towards right of midwicket and they rush for a quick single.
holes out to deep midwicket. He wanted to finish it off in style but has perished. He moved outside leg, Tanvir banged it short and Yuvraj topedged his pull to Butt. Out for 48.
short and outside off stump, Dhoni has a lazy waft, misses and so does Sarfraz
full and on the middle stump, just about manages to put bat to ball and squeezes it to point
Dhoni finishes the game with a bottom-hand powered drive over long-on. This is the fastest India have polished off a target of 300 or more.
